basic_information.scholarship_name: Terrill Smith Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Chemistry. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Chemistry major 3.5 GPA or above Undergraduate student Two faculty letters of recommendation

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
